input_string: [MASK] time she looked into mason 's face , she was grateful that he looked nothing like his father .
his platinum blond hair and blue eyes were completely hers [MASK]
it was only his build that he was taking after his father [MASK]
where megan was a diminutive 5'3 '' , davis was 6'1 '' and two hundred pounds [MASK]
mason was [MASK] registering off the charts in height and weight according to his pediatrician .
davis had seen mason [MASK] twice in his lifetime-the day he had been born and the day he came home from the hospital .
after that , he had n't been interested in [MASK] of the pictures and emails megan sent .
with his professional football career on the rise , davis had n't wanted [MASK] be shackled with the responsibilities of a baby .
instead , he wanted to spend his time off the [MASK] partying until all hours of the night .
he [MASK] paid child support when megan threatened to have his wages garnished .
